page.title: 06 CHARITABLE FUNDS
page.content: There is a Mandy Barnet fund, which helps disabled children. The Sark Dental Fund is very helpful because they pay for our trips to the Dentist, in return the children collect Channel Island stamps. For children who go to Guernsey schools, the Professor Saint Education fund helps out with payments. In return the school children help by having sales, carol services, dances and social evenings to raise money for local charities and for others like the "Blue Peter" appeals. The pubs hold regular discos in the summer, from around 9pm until 12.30am on Tuesdays and Saturdays. There are also space invaders, pool tables and juke boxes to use when the pubs are open.Money raised from the discos goes to the Flying Christine (ambulance launch) or Life-boat.
